title: I Hope You Die Laughing: A Beginner's Guide to Estate Planning by N. M. Harvey Esq.
description: You know you need a will or a trust, and possibly more, but you're not sure what you need, and you sure don't want to pay a lot of money to an attorney to find out. This book will help you understand basic estate planning, and get you on the road to preparing an estate plan that is right for you. This dark and heavy topic is delivered with a dose of humor, and plenty of stories to make the difficult concepts easy to understand.
author: N.  Harvey
